description:
A practical guide to spotting and tackling student lack of motivation. This course gives you ready-to-use ideas for motivating your unmotivated students; easy communication strategies for approaching and talking with unmotivated students; practical tools and insight into creating a more comfortable and productive classroom environment for all your students.

SECTION 1
Course Presentation: Why Take This Course

SECTION 2

UNMOTIVATED STUDENTS PART I - HOW TO RECOGNIZE THEM

  • Unmotivated Students' Learning Profile and Learning Attitude
  • Reasons and Causes for Students Unmotivation
  • Tackle Unmotivation: A 3-Step Strategy

SECTION 3

UNMOTIVATED STUDENTS PART II - HOW TO APPROACH THEM

  • How, Where, When and Why Would You Approach An Unmotivated Student
  • Low Emotional Intelligence and Unmotivation
  • Before Approaching The Student - How To Prepare Yourself
  • The Moment of Giving Feedback

SECTION 4

UNMOTIVATED STUDENTS PART III - HOW TO HELP THEM

  • The Cycle of Failure
  • The Fear of Success
  • Communication Strategies With Unmotivated Students
title: Unhappy Learners: How To Handle Unmotivated Students
